DOC.brief_summary: The main objective study evaluate whether acceptance ( measure AAQ-II questionnaire ) prognostic algo-functional change measure Oswestry Disability Index , ODI ) 6 month .
DOC.brief_title: Are Acceptance Commitment Related Treatment Response Chronic Low Back Pain
DOC.detailed_description: The secondary objective : A . To search correlation acceptance score ( AAQ-II Questionnaire ) score cop ( CSQ ) , avoidance ( FABQ ) , understand ( BBQ ) , anxiety depression ( HADS ) quality life ( SF-12 ) baseline . B . To describe kinetics change various parameter ( acceptance , cop , avoidance , understanding , anxiety depression , quality life , ODI ) 6 month . C. To evaluate agreement two method questionnaire presentation : Paper collection versus collection Tablet PC .
DOC.criteria: The patient inform study , oppose study The patient must insure beneficiary health insurance plan The patient available 6 month followup The subject chronic back pain postoperative nature last 3 month The subject accept reeducation curriculum . The patient participate another study The patient exclusion period determine previous study The patient judicial protection , tutorship curatorship The patient refuse participate It impossible correctly inform patient The patient pregnant , parturient , breastfeed The subject history chronic obstructive pulmonary disease , cardiovascular disease , rheumatoid arthritis , lupus , spondylitis neoplastic disease . Patient currently psychological treatment
